results.name: Number of compositions of n, where the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts is 10.
comment: With offset 20 number of compositions of n, where the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts is -10.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 10..1000
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 16 2014
